Package ch.nolix.system.consoleClient

Class ConsoleBackClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.bases.OptionalSignableElement<C>
      • ch.nolix.system.client.Client<BGUIC>
        • ch.nolix.system.baseGUIClient.BaseGUIClient<ConsoleBackClient>
          • ch.nolix.system.consoleClient.ConsoleBackClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closable, OptionalSignable<C>, Resettable, Signable<C>, Signed, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class ConsoleBackClient
extends BaseGUIClient<ConsoleBackClient>
    A console back client is a client whose counterpart provides a console and an info panel.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ConsoleBackClient​(DuplexController duplexController)
      Creates new console client with the given duplex controller.
